{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Raspberry Pi Based Mini Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.seeedstudio.com/Dual-GbE-Carrier-Board-with-4GB-RAM-32GB-eMMC-RPi-CM4-Case-p-5029.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = SeeedStudio_CM4_Mini_Router |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = SeeedStudio |model = CM4 Mini Router |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = V1.1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/01/2022 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/SeeedStudio_CM4_Mini_Router |wlclass = AC600 |series = RPi-CM4 |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2ABCB-RPICM4, 2ABCB-RPIRM0 |icid = 20953-RPIRM0 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM2711; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A72 (v8-A) |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz <!-- 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = eMMC 5.1 |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLMBG2JETD-B041; |flash1size = 32 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25Q16JVSIQ; |flash2size = 2 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4F8E304HM-MGCJ; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Broadcom;BCM54210PE; |eth3chip = Microchip;LAN7800; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 2C:F7:F1, E4:5F:01 |oui = E4:5F:01
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;5.4.188;OpenWrt 21.02;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 4 |pwr_conn = USB Female (Type-C)
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 5.0, Micro SD Card slot, Micro HDMI, MIPI CSI, MIPI DSI, I2C, SPI, heatsink |addchip = Super Speed USB 3.0 Host Controller;VIA;VL805;;1;,,, 4Kb Microwave Serial EEPROM w/ 8-bit IF;Microchip;93LC66A;;1;,,, 4.5-28V 3A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS54302;;1;,,, Current-Limited Power-Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2041B;;1;,,, Current-Limited Power-Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2042B;;1;,,, Common Mode Filter w/ ESD Protection;ON Semi;EMI8142;;2;,,, 5 Output Universal PMIC;MaxLinear (Exar);MxL7704;;1;,,, 300mA CMOS LDO Regulator;Diodes Inc;AP2127;;1;,,, ESD Suppressor Diode;TI;TPD4E05U06;;9; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = <!-- Leave blank --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/03/2020 |estreldate = 08/2021 |estprice = 149 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAU2EGZ41100 |asin = B09F6MLKQM |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = RFP Raspberry Pi RPi-RM0 |rad1modif = <!-- Radio Module Interface Type, Leave blank for none --> |rad1chip1 = Cypress;CYW43455; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Device uses [[Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4 (CM4104032)]]
{{See also|RPF Raspberry Pi series|SeeedStudio}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM2711 @1.5GHz :SoC: Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A72) *GPU: [[Broadcom]] VideoCore VI @500MHz :OpenGL ES 3.1, Vulkan 1.0, :H.265 (HEVC) (up to 4Kp60 decode), :H.264 (up to 1080p60 decode, 1080p30 encode) *Storage: 32GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[Cypress]] CYW43455 :802.11abgn/ac (1T1R), BT 5.0 (BLE) *Network: 2x GbE ports *USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports *Power Source: 5V 4A via USB (Type-C)
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/08/02/raspberry-pi-compute-module-4-mini-router-keeps-cool-with-aluminum-alloy-cover/ ''Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4 Mini Router'' on '''CNX|Software''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Raspberry Pi CM4 (CM4104032) Top.jpeg|SoM Top File:Raspberry Pi CM4 (CM4104032) Bottom.jpeg|SoM Bottom File:Seeed Studio Dual Gigabit Carrier Top.jpeg|Carrier Top File:Seeed Studio Dual Gigabit Carrier Bottom.jpeg|Carrier Bottom File:Seeed Studio Mini Router Adapter Board.jpeg|Adapter Board File:Seeed Studio Mini Router Internal.jpeg|Internal File:Seeed Studio Mini Router External.jpeg|External </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
